generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with tram tracks running down the center, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: There are paved areas along the sides of the road, separated by curbs, where pedestrians are walking, indicating sidewalks.
- building: The structure on the right side of the image, with large pillars and windows, is clearly a building.
- wall: The stone wall on the far left of the image is an individual standing wall.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- traffic light: The traffic light box is visible above the road, showing a green light.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a triangular yield sign and a circular sign with an arrow.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green leaves are visible along the road and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: Several people are visible walking on the sidewalks and crossing the street.
- car: A white car is parked on the right side of the road.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- bicycle: Several bicycles are visible parked on the sidewalk on the left side of the image.
